tweets.text:
Do you want to know what European #energy #regulators think about the @EU_Commission's #hydrogen & #decarbonised #gas market #package?

👉Out now: the @eu_acer-CEER Position Paper on the Key Regulatory Requirements to Achieve Gas Decarbonisation.⚡️
👉https://t.co/PS2w0T3jMH https://t.co/YasnQF8ycs

#CACM2.0
ACER recommends changes to the capacity calculation process to specify the determination of capacity calculation regions and align the capacity calculation processes and bidding zone review with the Electricity Regulation  (incl. 70% target)

#CACM2.0
ACER recommends to establish a European single legal entity to perform the #market coupling operator’s tasks within five years after entry into force. https://t.co/sx7uU1tC3C

#CACM2.0
ACER proposes amendments to the current #marketcoupling governance set-up of the #CACM Regulation by introducing a joint decision making body for all TSOs and NEMOs and qualified majority voting for decisions on #marketcoupling….

ACER publishes the #Recommendation on the reasoned amendments to the #CACM Regulation including amendments to the #SO Regulation.
#CACM2.0. https://t.co/fSPPVZ2ggw

ACER publishes the #Recommendation on the reasoned amendments to the #CACM Regulation #CACM2.0.
It includes changes to:
-#marketcoupling governance and operations, to make them fit for future challenges
-capacity calculation & #bidding zone review
https://t.co/fZHU8DGDvp

This week, @CitizenSane1, @janrosenow and @DaveW_FORESIGHT are joined by @Dehessel from @eu_acer to discuss our dependence on #gas and, with the recent price crisis that swept across Europe, how we can break our grasp on the fuel: https://t.co/Y0kK8wLgxU
#energytransition https://t.co/3LlR1HPgJn

#Energy | The most important finding of @eu_acer  report is that there is no evidence that markets do not work. It highlights the many benefits of the current market model for the final customer, which has helped to mitigate price rises, emphasized minister @JernejVrtovec. https://t.co/HIQJAr0aTh
